title: When trying to add esim, my pixel 4 XL only lets me add esim from Vodafone, not from other carrier.
content:
When I press the + sign next to the current network, I press Download simcard, I press next, the phone checks networkdata and then asks me to scan QR-code from Vodafone. Which is very strange, since I have an esim from T-Mobile. And it's weird because there is nowhere in this process that you can select from which carrier you want to add an esim.
After scanning the T-Mobile esim QR-code, it gives an 'Incorrect QR-code' error, and says I should contact Vodafone. Which would also be weird because they have nothing to do with this phone.
Adding the code manually also gives an error.

I bought this phone without a subscription to a carrier, at belsimpel.nl.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
